You vanillas, as usual, let your addiction for "whulesumness" take over you and cast away reason. If you'd bothered as much as to reach the last pages, you'll learn that it's one of the bullymc's perverted friends making a hentai ntr story about them. Now, I do not approve of such a weak cop out, not necessary in my opinion, it serves no purpose other then "HA, JUST A PRANK BRUH, JUST KIDDIN' MATE IT WAS ALL A DREAM!", but the point is that, it's fiction, fiction within fiction, for none of these characters are real, you get that? They don't exist, now they may, perhaps, be loosely based on some real life stuff from the author, or it may all just be their imagination. You're all getting so anal about i is morbidly amusing, as if you had less then 12 years, 15 at best and can't discern fiction from reality, so you get all worked up. This work's comment section was quiet for years before you normie shitters caught wind of it and without fail, bringing your loud, pissy fee-fees along too.

Oh, the "#whulesum" crew has finally found this old work, this hentai work which is older then that kyoani movie, which I pressume is how you fags learned about this story of a deaf girl and an overly evil bully (the mc you chumps feel sooo bad about) who unprovoked took it upon himself to make her life as miserable as possible and bullied her off school, I know kids that age can be extraordinary evil, almost pure the sheer amount of malice that those lil' shits can contain, not a saint myself, what I'm sure is that most of you here who came for an ol' rub didn't bother with the manga, only movie, which explains why there's suddenly so many of you vanilla fags in a koe no katachi ntr (not really ntr since here the mcs are far from close other then the brutal bully times), you think that what you saw in the movies was bad? They were holding back, in manga, he is even worse, honestly by comparison, "ntr-man" over there isn't that far from the mc you're feeling so sorry and offended for.

Shouya just needs to use strategy and intelligence. He searches the internet how to prepare acid and carries in a bottle, he then throws in the face of the alpha providing burns. And takes Nishimaya's strength back.

Shouya from then on could get together with Ueno and he would work out, exercise, study hard, work hard, and he would treat Ueno right. But his love for Shouko hasn't faded, and she is always on the back of his mind. How alpha dude ruined her. He will never forgive alpha dude. An epic struggle of good morals vs abuse would pursue, and the fucked up part is that Shouko is happy as she is-- that would be very psychological, and intriguing story elements could come out of it. [part 2. That's all I have to say lol. Yeah I got too much time on my hands]

You know, this hentai could actually make a cool story. The alpha jerkass dude could be a very intimidating rival for a dark romance story; the main character could be like Shouya, weak with little self confidence. But once he finds the woman that he loves being treated like an object-- and she's enjoying it-- he would get incentive to become stronger. He would meet up with Ueno and then the alpha rival shows up again and slaps Ueno, right; Shouya wouldn't take that. Shouya would go after the guy and throw a punch. Then, in front of Ueno (and maybe Shouko could be there, too), Shouya is completely trashed by the alpha guy. He breaks some of Shouya's ribs, gives him a black eye, blood is gushing from Shouya's mouth and nose, some teeth were knocked out; Ueno is horrified, but Shouko's mind has been broken by the alpha male and so she sees Shouya's defeat as pathetic and congratulates alpha guy for teaching Shouya his place. It would be the ultimate humiliation. [part 1]
